text:
We are asked all the time about open sourcing T3 Chat. While we don’t plan to do that any time soon, the lack of a good OSS AI chat app has bugged me for awhile. The few that exist are cool, but they are severely lacking on the UI/UX side

I wanted to fix that. Putting up over
